price: As for the earth, We have spread it out and placed therein firm mountains, and caused to grow therein everything in due proportion.
arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡزُونٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
